title: Data Relevance Assessment and Selection Criteria
description: Evaluate datasets for relevance to data mining goals. Establish clear criteria for data inclusion/exclusion based on quality, technical constraints, and analytical requirements.

title: Dataset Inclusion/Exclusion Documentation
description: Document rationale for including or excluding specific datasets and attributes. Create comprehensive justification based on established selection criteria.

title: Significance Testing and Statistical Analysis
description: Perform significance and correlation tests to determine which fields should be included in the analysis. Apply statistical methods to validate attribute importance.

title: Correlation Analysis and Feature Importance
description: Conduct correlation analysis between variables. Determine feature importance and weight attributes based on their relevance to modeling requirements.

title: Data Selection Criteria Refinement
description: Refine data selection criteria based on data quality assessment and exploration findings. Apply advanced data reduction techniques like PCA if appropriate.

title: Missing Values Analysis and Imputation
description: Analyze patterns of missing data and implement appropriate imputation strategies. Document the impact of missing values and chosen treatment methods.

title: Outlier Detection and Treatment
description: Identify outliers using statistical methods and domain knowledge. Implement appropriate treatment strategies (removal, transformation, or retention with justification).

title: Data Noise and Special Values Handling
description: Identify and address various types of data noise. Handle special values and their meanings. Document decisions for correcting, removing, or ignoring noise.

title: Categorical Variable Transformation and Encoding
description: Transform and encode categorical variables for modeling. Implement appropriate encoding techniques (one-hot, label, ordinal) and discretize or scale numerical variables as needed.

title: Data Splitting and Sampling Strategy
description: Implement data sampling techniques and split datasets into training and testing sets. Document sampling methodology and ensure representative splits for modeling phase.
